text: Kirillovo () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Kirillovsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 773 as of 2010. There are 11 streets. == Geography == It is located 30 km from Ufa. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Kirillovo, Republic of Bashkortostan
